titles.title: A resolution to authorize the review of closed session transcript of the Committee on Foreign Relations.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 11/6/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Chairman and Ranking Minority Member of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee to make available to the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Florida, for its in camera review, the closed session testimony of Jorge Morales before the Subcommittee on Terrorism, Narcotics and International Operations.
